"Lisa":
"Well? Isn't that gunslash a lot of fun?
Still, you may find it doesn't pack the
punch you want."

"You should figure out a fighting style
that works well with the gunslash.
It's good for Hunters and Forces too."

"Oh, were you busy tormenting
hostiles? Forgive me if I got in the way."

"Well, that's about it. I hope you'll
come back with a long list of kills!
Okay then! Off you go!"
